comment: What about Scalability principles in your design?
Andy, I saw your short demo at Google I/O and I must say Hinge looks great! Are you planning on having a Linux port as well, or is too early to talk about that?
Just be wary of design trade-offs. Best of luck to you!
This looks like a good competitor for Files by Google. I hope your app makes it to the mainstream.
The only problem is dependency on an external driver! The driver should come prepackaged with the hardware with automatic update support!
This is definitely a data privacy issue! You must hire a DevOps major to wrap his arms around this!
What sort of encryption techniques does your software employ?
Talk to business people like a non-technical person and software design to techies
There must be a package manager for Windows too just like Brew! Let's put in a request to Microsoft!
The solution is good, but far from being cloud-ready!
